website_summaries.verdict: Though it remains somewhat pricey, the Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Speaker III is a superlative portable wireless loudspeaker, improving on its already impressive predecessor.
pros: The Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Speaker III sounds great for a compact Bluetooth speaker, playing louder than its predecessor and offering much better battery life
It also has a sleek and sturdy design, an auxiliary input, and the option to swap out protective covers (sold separately)
cons: The speaker is pricey and has no speakerphone capabilities
requires dedicated AC adapter for charging (doesn't charge via Micro-USB)

customer_reviews.title: Typical Bose product:
customer_reviews.text: Typical Bose product: Sound is quite good, but underwhelming considering the high price, nor is it particularly powerful, not to mention that you have to hit the volume 10 times for there to be any significant difference. Bare bones features too: No way to control it remotely AFAIK, no external output or EQ of any sort. For almost $300, there should be far more to this unit. Revisted after 1.5 years: No longer using this unit - it is stashed away in a drawer. Not a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Stinkfoot

customer_reviews.title: meh... broke after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: mine lasted 6 months before it broke down, which is not what i was hoping for when i bought it. It got to a point where it wouldnt charge or turn on. I sent it back to bose, which was a whole deal trying to get them to sendme the shipping label and such. I loved this while it worked, but for the money, im kind of mad it broke so fast. hopefully bose will fix it, then i would say 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are DOA
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and the batteries were dead within a month. Turns out getting the battery replaced is a huge hassle that requires I drive a several hours and pay almost what the speakers cost themselves. Such a ripoff. Also, BOSE warranty doesn't cover items purchased through Amazon. Don't do it! Buy your speakers in store.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and build quality, not much better if at all, than the mini.....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bluetooth speaker, but not quite the "bang for your buck" that the Mini is. I have the mini in my office at work, got this full size for the house. I can't really tell much of a difference in sound quality or sound. In fact, the mini has a battery meter function on my phone that this one does not do. For the added size and money, the Soundlink is not quite the value that the mini is. Yes, they are both excellent speakers. If I was buying them again, i would probably get the mini.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, as expected from Bose!
customer_reviews.text: Good sound & Long battery life-- plays music for 8+ hours. Currently, we have 2 of these speakers connected to Avantree Oasis bluetooth transmitter for our iTunes playlist on PC to play audio in reception area & massage treatment room. This is the product link for transmitter (works great btw):]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not The Greatest.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker. The bass is supremely resonant on the lower volumes, but distorts near maximum volume. This is a great speaker for easy listening and to carry a medium sized party. Bought the UE Megaboom and returned the Bose, though. The Megaboom packs a huge punch and stays crystal clear even at maximum volume. It's also much more durable than the Bose. If you're looking for a larger range I would go with a different speaker (particularly the Megaboom).
customer_reviews.author: Jenson Titus Lavallee

customer_reviews.title: Where is this bass coming from
customer_reviews.text: I'm wondering how this speaker delivers such deep bass. Maybe too much. Sounds like it set right at the verge of clipping. Nice crisp high notes too. I bought it for work but it easily outclasses my JBL On Stage III plugged into my computer. I'll use it for home while it's charging then take it to work. Connected right away to my iPad but took a while to connect to my Dell desktop. It's a bit heavy so consider when taking it somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: This speaker produces beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker produces beautiful sound...I don't know all of the technical terms but I've been listening to music a long time and this is the best speaker I've used. There's a full and wonderful range of tones whether the volume is low or high. At first I had a problem with the bluetooth connection when switching from one device to another (i.e..iPad to Mac). That situation is solved by disconnecting the speaker and reconnecting to the desired device. It's really easy to do. I found help with this at the Bose website. I also bought the cover which comes in a variety of colors; probably protects the speaker to some extent but honestly, it just looks good. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Artzee Books and More

customer_reviews.title: (Lasts about 12 hours continuous play at half volume (which is pretty loud)) 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: So through my life, i've owned many sound systems, a few sound bars, and a handful of bluetooth speakers. This speaker has to be one of the cleanest sounding speakers I have ever had. The price is a little steep, but well worth it. The bass isn't ground-shaking, but it's to be expected with a portable speaker. I use it every day and only charge it every-other day. (Lasts about 12 hours continuous play at half volume (which is pretty loud)) 5 stars. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Survived a YEAR outside in the North Dakota elements!!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing!! The sound quality and battery life are great!! BUT the most AMAZING thing is the fact that my husband used it A YEAR AGO and forgot where he left it. We just found it in the box of his pickup and it works perfectly! ONE WHOLE YEAR in the elements!! Rain, snow 100° days on a black pickup bed and it works like new!! I cant believe it!! (He's never using it again. I love this little speaker.)
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife who was using a cheap little cube speaker. The sound of this thing is far superior to any that we tested locally and is also capable of matching any other unit in volume without much distortion. The battery life is impressive and has never been an issue. It is pretty durable and hasn't had a single issue after nearly 2 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound, great connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: This Bose sound link III has very good sound and the only reason for a 4 star is because on the higher volume it has a lot of base. However, at medium volume is very nice. Battery life and connective is excellent. I like the style and it’s easy to carry. Unfortunately, Bose has discontinued this model. I hope they bring it back. The price seems a bit higher but you are paying for the Bose quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gramajo

customer_reviews.title: Still Booming after a 2 year of use!
customer_reviews.text: I never got around to doing a review... But check this out... I've dropped this baby, sprayed pool water on it, left it in the sun after passing out from drinking and partying in my pool, left it charging for days on end all in 2 years of use... This is without a doubt one of the best Bluetooth speakers I've EVER bought! But the number one thing about this Bose speaker is that the battery still holds a charge like it did from the first day! As for the sound... C'mon Man! its a Bose! I recommend this speaker or any follow up model, make sure you do get a custom cover for added protection. 5 Thumbs Up Bose!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very good but pricey - if that wasn't obvious already
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, but for the price, I'd like it to sound better. I'm no audiophile. I would just like to be able to adjust the ranges on bass, midrange and treble because I listen to many different types of music. Plenty of volume! Nice looking. Heavy - I won't be traveling with it. Still, it does sound a LOT better than the much less expensive Bluetooth speakers I own. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: High Rise Views

customer_reviews.title: Bose the clear winner by a wide wide margin
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep it simple. While I've seen reviews comparing Bose to the UE Boom, they really aren't even in the same class because The Bose SoundLink is far far superior to other bluetooth speakers in the similar price range, including the UE Boom. I first ordered the Ultimate Ears BOOM Wireless Bluetooth Speaker. Love the design and 360 degree sound, but it clearly doesn't have the deep, rich bass tones. Then ordered the Bose. This is a Pros vs. Amateurs competition, and there is no contest with Bose the clear winner by a wide wide margin.
customer_reviews.author: colokeith

customer_reviews.title: I was ripped
customer_reviews.text: One year, battery dead and unit won't work when plugged in to ac
customer_reviews.author: Silverrose

customer_reviews.title: not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Just to state i have used alot of blutooth speakers and bose by far has always been the better choice when it comes to speakers, but in my opinion they missed the mark with this one. The bose speaker was jist not loud enough for me and i would need a super quite room in order to enjoy the sound. I found the infinity one blutooth speaker to be louder and having just about the same bass the only downfall on both was at 100% volume they distorted but the infinity only did it with super heavy bass like certain rap.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Davila

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for such a small unit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit, I highly recommend. Fantastic sound, portability and versatility. In addition to Bluetooth, I can connect to older music sources through the Auxiliary Input. (Great for those of us that have an original iPod Classic that still works!) Yes, I still use it....occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: DLMA

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound for smallish box. Not cheap but then Bose never is. Bluetooth works great. I've dropped it twice from a height of 4 feet and not a mark on it so construction is first rate. Worth the price vs. no-name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Landon

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine little speaker with great sound just not enough volume
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine little speaker with great sound just not enough volume. It cost way too much money for what you get. I'm returning it and I'll use that money for a more high end Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Mauldin

customer_reviews.title: Too basey, and goes to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Mellow sound, but little too basey for my taste. No base/treble control. Goes to sleep after 15 or 20 minutes, and doesn't wake up when it detects incoming sound. This can make you look pretty foolish in the middle of a presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  Berry

customer_reviews.title: What are you going to believe? The hype or your own lying ears?
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality really isn't good for a wide range of music, especially at higher volumes. Dumb AC charger, so you can't charge it in your vehicle without an inverter or at least a different cable. At this price it should be a whole lot better. I didn't expect it to sound like a home system, but jeez. At least the build quality is good, and it looks nice. I seriously hate to return things, but this one is likely going back.
customer_reviews.author: Just Tom

customer_reviews.title: Both great! I actually think the base in the mini ...
customer_reviews.text: I have both the 3 and the mini 2. Both great! I actually think the bass in the mini 2 is better but the clarity and volume is much greater in the 3. As should be for it is a much larger unit but I expected a little more base from it. Bose sound link III, pros... Good loudness, great clarity, still some what compact, good battery life, not 14 hours but still good, easy to use. Cons... bass is a little week, no speaker phone, no remote for when hard wired, bluetooth distance not the best, not water resistant, price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Little Box - BIG Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at a multitude of reviews all over the internet to assist me with making a decision on a portable speaker that was small/portable enough for travel and offered rich, booming sound. My quest ended here with the purchase of the Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Speaker. It was a little pricier than some other portable Bluetooth speakers, but portability, better than average battery life and above average sound quality (along with the Bose name) made this speaker a natural choice to meet all my needs. I have not been disappointed at all with my choice and highly recommend this quality device!
customer_reviews.author: P Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little thing!
customer_reviews.text: I am almost always happy with Bose and overall this expierience is no different. I keep this on the 2nd floor of on open hard wood foyer in our 4000 ft2 home and it sounds great almost every where! A little large for being called portable. Not all that exciting to look at. I WISH I could turn it on/off with my device though or at least bypass its auto shut off when not in use. Overall, great sound, small package, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be made with quality; sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds as good or better than my old Bose cd/fm radio that I have had for 15 years. I am pleased with this purchase. I really wanted to get a Marshall because I heard one at Best Buy last year, but their customer reviews are so terrible I thought I would go with something more reliable and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound. Very pleased and impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Awesome sound. Good things come in small packages with this item. I don’t see very many people being upset to own and use this impressive speaker. Best of the best the date I purchased it in 2015 and here almost 2019 and have NEVER regretted this purchase (my first Bose).
customer_reviews.author: dand

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The online reviews are very accurate. The sound is surprisingly strong and it favors the bass. I took it on vacation in the countryside of Italy where I had no other entertainment sources. I used it indoors and outdoors regularly for two weeks, and also used it on long drives. I was satisfied in every environment. I listen to a lot of classical - it's not at its best with big, complex orchestrations due to the bass. Despite that I was very happy with the overall quality. I also listen to jazz - it was great for American Songbook artists. I think other popular music should be great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... speaker for a few months now and I am pretty impressed. It's sort of expensive
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for a few months now and I am pretty impressed. It's sort of expensive, but THANK goodness it's worth it. It's quite small, but the size is a perk in this case, not a detriment. If you place it against a wall or close to one like it says, you get much better base and sound quality overall. It's very portable, easy to connect, and it works great! I knew there was a reason I was spending the extra to get a Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: The Best Wireless Speaker On The Market
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the sound that comes out of this portable speaker. It's so good, it's hard to believe that something wireless could be so powerful. Speaking as someone who upgraded from a SoundTouch 10 (an excellent speaker in it's own right), I was blown away at the sound that comes from the SoundLinkIII. It's easy to connect to bluetooth devices and even sounds great when connected to the TV via an audio cord. If you're on the fence about this speaker (like I was), make the leap and purchase it. You won't be disappointed. I mean the bass is OUT OF THIS WORLD!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: The battery will only last about 2 years. There is no way you can open it to replace the battery. If you still want to keep using it after 2 years you will have to send to the factory for about half the price of a new one. I feel like I was ripped off for the amount money this unit it costs I expected to use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Nupel

customer_reviews.title: Louder and Clearer
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bose Soundlink Mini, but needed something louder for the gym during volleyball practice. The mini gets muffled when cranked up really high. But the soundlink III is pretty clear when cranked up, and I didn't really have to crank it up that high to get it loud. Solved my problem. Definitely louder and clearer. I did not give it five star because I have not used it long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Hoang

customer_reviews.title: This turned me into a Bose fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome speaker and I don't get why there are reviews saying this is not loud enough. When I turned this on to watch movies, I always worry about annoying downstairs neighbours because of the great bass it has. In the past, I didn't quite get it why Bose charges so much money for its products and after I use Soundlink III, I got it. Bose products offer un-duplicatable user experience. Now I bought Bose Soundsport earbuds and I can't wait to try them, too!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best you will find
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing speaker. I like the portability and long battery life as well as the excellent sound. I use it as the sound system when watching movies using my DLP projector and screen in a large room. My wife has used it for her dance performances in large rooms and there is plenty of sound volume. I did have to sent the original one back because the bluetooth refused to connect after using it for three days. The replacement is working fine. This is one thing I really like about Amazon. Getting a replacement was quick and easy - and convenient. The replacement arrived in two days, and we were back in business.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Grabarek

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great portability - works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after buying Vizio's soundbar and sold the soundbar shortly after. Great sound, ease of use, portable and has become my bedside companion. Been using it for the last 7 months and quite happy with the product. I'm a musician and this can also be used as a portable speaker (connect source to AUX) when I travel. The lights were a bit too bright but I've covered them with tape so they're very faint in the night. One small hack - face the speaker UPWARDS (speaker facing the ceiling) for great sound while you do your other work.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Impressive---A Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressive sound. My only issues are the price and the volume. Doesn't go quite as loud as I would like. Also, $300 for this little jewel is a bit steep, but if you have the money, you may really like it. I do! Links easily with Bluetooth, good sound. Used it outdoors at a small wedding and worked fine. Not sure about battery life. I If you're a sound fanatic, you may not be impressed; but for the rest of us...an excellent purchase. If you buy one, your kids will borrow it a lot. I warned you!
customer_reviews.author: dyle51Top Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: MY brother got one for his B-day, When I ...
customer_reviews.text: MY brother got one for his B-day, When I heard the sound that came out of this Sound Link III, Had to buy one. (NICE). Do not need to buy a home system any more. BUY ONE ( GETTER/ DONE)
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: After listening to a speaker like this at a friend's house I knew I wanted one. They help set the mood when camping, enjoying time on the back deck or casual listening around the house. 4 stars only because this was a used unit but in all other aspects it works great and sounds even better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: U
customer_reviews.text: Have the sound link mini,and a Marshall Kilburn,this is a nice addition.they all sound great.use them when I don't need a wall of sound.to many people seem to think these blue tooth speakers will some how sound like a high end stereo.to sound like one you have to actually have one.snuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Westling

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Looks great. My problem is when I charge it and put it away. It seems to drain or something because I need to charge again before using. This is my first Bose and it doesn't make me want to look at the newer models. With their name and reputation things should work flawlessly. But once again does sound really,really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Nordeen

customer_reviews.title: Good base. Good for parties.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for years now and it still works fine. Battery is still good and I just love the base. Although I initially purchased this as a speaker that I could bring with me for when I travel. Realized, it was such a hassle to have to take it with me in my flights. No regrets though. Music quality is good but I’m planning to purchase a much portable one for travels and leave this in my room or for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Siongco

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound and Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. I'm surprised it produces such a full sound! It’s compact and feels solid, well built. I like the simplicity of the buttons and options. We purchased a case and the charging cradle, both of which I recommend. The cradle keeps the cord nicely tucked away and the speaker sits on the cradle in our kitchen so it’s always fully charged and ready to go outside or elsewhere in the house. The only downside I would mention is the high tones in the music are not as prevalent but the sound is still pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: Yep...they lost on "the stupidest call by a coach in the history of the Big Game". Doesn't matter to my being a fan. So, the look is great, but you want to know about the sound. WOW! That is it in a nutshell. This baby cranks it out with clarity and great tone. Even better, my '73 VW bus is a great place for me to use this baby. It connects quick and easy to my phone and puts me in touch with all my music or audio books when I am on the road or just sitting on a bluff looking out at the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: TW Brown, Author, Editor, and Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, but portable unit that packs a great sound!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an old Bose SoundDock for use at our summer cabin (and elsewhere offseason). I like it so much better than the Sound Dock. It's very portable, but heavy and solid -- more so than you would expect. It's easy to use with your devices and best of all, the sound is great! We're very pleased. Would recommend investing in the charging cradle so that you can listen while charging. Because we bought that and use it, it does everything the old SoundDock did. I think I like this unit much better!
customer_reviews.author: Great Dane

customer_reviews.title: Bass is distorted due to poor equalization
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit and was very disappointed with the built-in exaggerated bass response. It creates an overly loud, mushy and distorted bass that overwhelms treble instruments. There are no tone controls on the unit so you're stuck with this. It's similar to the headphones made for teenagers and rap fans that amplify the bass. If Bose would add tone controls or proper equalization it would greatly improve the Soundlink.
customer_reviews.author: diamondo

customer_reviews.title: Big issues
customer_reviews.text: 1. Does not auto connect to device, have to push the button each time, times out after 30 minutes or so, probably less. 2. How the heck does the battery run low when it is connected to AC? After several hours of use on AC the device disconnects from my phone and the battery light flickers. How is this possible? I never even used the unit unplugged so it's not like the battery has been abused.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, compact, more volume than you likely need
customer_reviews.text: Well, the sound of the Bose simply cannot be beat. It is amazing how much you can get out of this little guy! In a previous version, I believe the SoundLink II, there was a sort of leather case that flapped over the speaker and protected it a little bit from potential damage. That is the only thing missing from this version that I would have liked to see. There seem to be some cases for this, but I have not looked into them or purchased one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bose Soundlink 111.
customer_reviews.text: It's Bose!! What can I say!!! I love the music of TSO. For those not familiar, this is Trans Siberian Orchestra, and listening on this exquisite device is the absolute best! The sounds of the base guitars, and all the instruments are fantastic! This was my Christmas present to me, and I highly recommend the Bose Soundlink Bluetooth Speaker 111. It's easily portable and I purchased a cover in teal which offers some protection. I think mainly for looks; however, you'll never go wrong with this speaker system. Easily connects, no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W Bulla

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sound from a device more powerful than its dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The sound from this 10 x 5 inch speaker is incredibly melodious and powerful. Sometimes when I hear a deep bass thud out of it, it's almost hard to believe. I am a confirmed user of Bose products, also using the Bose OE Soundlink headphones, which I also highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kwei Quartey

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality from this is amazing and has noticeable bass to it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my wife. She loves it. I don't know how it would have compared to cheaper alternatives, however, the sound quality from this is amazing and has noticeable bass to it. My head no longer hurts from her playing music from her phone or the computer speakers. Based on the dimensions, I did have concerns about it tipping over (kids bumping into table or something). The weight is in the base and is quite stable. Unless someone physically pushed it over, it'll stay upright!
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth feature is great. Wife uses this mostly in the kitchen but ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker puts out a lot of quality sound. Bluetooth feature is great. Wife uses this mostly in the kitchen but we have a very open layout so it needed to be powerful enough it would fill both the kitchen, dining room, and living room. It does this easily. She even used it for a church activity where they needed music for dance lessons in the basketball gym. Worked great then as well. If you have one bedroom or small office, get the mini. If it's a bigger space, get this one. I have the mini also so that's from experience.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I really like this speaker because of it's portability and ease of ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker because of it's portability and ease of use. I bought it for our student ministry so that we could have a portable "sound system" at different events. It works great, looks great, packs easy and is easy for anyone to use. The only reason I didn't get it 5 stars is because the quality of sound at full blast gets a little jumbled and looses clarity. Because of that I turn it down a couple notches from the top. It still works great and is plenty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey G. Noblitt

customer_reviews.title: A Leader Ahead of the Pack
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think Bose needs my review. Their products and quality are stellar. I would think that any company would do itself good to mirror Bose’s workmanship and quality. I love all of my Bose products and am always so happy I spent the extra money for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P.

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy that I was able to find my Bose Soundlink ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my Bose Soundlink Bluetooth Speaker III the very next day. This is my second one because my previous one was recently stolen. I am so happy that I was able to find my Bose Soundlink Bluetooth Speaker III again. It works very nice just like my previous one. Thank you very much for taking IMMEDIATE MASSIVE ACTION!!!! The sound is OUTSTANDING. THE BOSE SUNDLINK BLUETOOTH SPEAKER III IS A KEEPER.
customer_reviews.author: Fay D. Edmond

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and size
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is easy to set up, has great battery life and sounds wonderful. The build quality is sturdy but the casing around the ports in the back seems curiously off. It is definitely worth more than the lowest cost speakers on the market but is probably more of a luxury purchase when compared to the mini. I am not sure it is worth the additional cost, I will leave that to those who have compared the two.
customer_reviews.author: cdela

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this product. We never really got to enjoy it as it just stopped working. Unfortunately it cannot be resolved through Amazon and we have to call Bose itself and try to sort out a problem with a product bought through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Saelens

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker not that I’m surprised Bose is the only ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker not that I’m surprised Bose is the only brand of speakers I’ve purchased for over 30 years. This speaker is super indoors, but the volume is lacking for outdoor use didn’t need it in my home outdoor use only. PUMP UP THE VOLUME BOSE..
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Another Amazon home run!
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play in 15 seconds. I missed the opportunity for my contractor to install quality speakers in my new master bath/spa. So, I typed in Bluetooth speakers in Amazon search and Bose sound link III appeared. The unit arrived today and I'm thrilled as it paired instantly with my iPhone. A huge advantage is the wire free operation including rechargeable power. Wow, just WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker, we've had it almost two years and still going strong. Big clear sound, holds charge well. We did buy a replacement charger since the original went out, but as much as we've used it I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: M Ray

customer_reviews.title: Spit out the Bose coolaid before you get stuck with a 300 dollar paperweight!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker less than 18 months and it is already not working properly. It does not play for no reason and just when you're ready to throw it in trash it kicks in. I have subsequently heard the Sonos and the Libratone and this is the Bose sound quality in comparison is like listening to a 79 Chevy front speaker. I say this having swallowed the Bose coolaid only to be rescued by the reality that maybe 30 years Bose was revolutionary now it's just repulsive.
customer_reviews.author: Insider Rebel

customer_reviews.title: So when my Mini disappeared I was up mad but decided to go with a bigger version in hopes of significantly better sound. Not rea
customer_reviews.text: I had the Bose SoundLink Mini and was overly impressed with the sound it created. So when my Mini disappeared I was up mad but decided to go with a bigger version in hopes of significantly better sound. Not really impressed. It sounds good but hear more distortion than I have ever heard with my SoundLink Mini. I am not sure if I will keep it and go back to the mini or upgrade to something a little bigger. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H.

customer_reviews.title: If you like AM radio quality sound this is the speaker for ...
customer_reviews.text: If you like AM radio quality sound this is the speaker for you. My $99 G-Boom sounds way better then this. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: VoodooSky

customer_reviews.title: Rediscover your music!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have the magical convenience of being a portable set (0 cables, long lasting battery, far reception of Bluetooth) with added deep sound and powerful bass. They are easy to pair and will work with any Bluetooth device. If you must, they also have line-in plug. I am rediscovering the music in my library and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Cavallin

customer_reviews.title: Limited Edition SoundLink Bluetooth Speaker III
customer_reviews.text: Great bluetooth speaker from a great company. I was looking at many other models but was considering size, price, battery life and sound quality. It's not a cheap speaker and I was checking other models at the stores as well. I've noticed that the NFL series were a bit cheaper and I had some Amazon gift cards to spare so I allowed myself into Bose product again. I'm pleased with their quality, an impressive sound from a portable speaker. It would be fun to be able to go outdoors and have music on the go with friends. Bose has good tech support everytime it was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor mom

customer_reviews.title: awesome sound for small size
customer_reviews.text: i have a very open house and i can hear it all over. I purchased it for work but it was too powerful for small space.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Chase

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless speaker out there
customer_reviews.text: I love our bose Bluetooth speaker! I just wish it came with a USB cord if we aren't able to do Bluetooth. But seriously, this is the best speaker. It's super lightweight, it's loud! It's everything I could ask for in a wireless speaker! Plus the charge holds for hours and hours!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love the music
customer_reviews.text: WOOOWWWWWWW! Highly recommend this speaker! My husband downloaded all of our CD's onto our computer and we now easily enjoy the music thru this amazing sound system! It has a sleek profile and stunning sound. My nephew who plays the baritone came in one day while it was playing and asked where the orchestra was! We can take it outside to our back deck, 25-30 feet from the computer. Stellar! Need I say more?! :} LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Renee A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best around
customer_reviews.text: I own three of these units (work, home, cabin) hands down the best sound quality one could expect in such a small package. They are pretty durable as well. I accidently dropped one in the water getting off a boat. I dried it out for a few days and it is still working great two years later. Pretty impressive for a device that is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is small, portable, but the sound is high quality. I like the fact that I can easily take it with me anywhere I go within the house and outside. No issues with Bluetooth connectivity. The only thing - since it is meant for being moved around a lot - I would recommend getting a protective cover as mine started showing finger prints after just 2 days. The cover Bose offers takes care of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is great. The sound quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. The sound quality is excellent! I was debating between this one and the mini soundlink and am very pleased with the decision to go with this one. The mini is perfect if you only want sound in one room- this one can get really loud and truly has a stereo sound that can really fill up an entire room and more. I love that it's chargeable and that it can be taken from room to room. Can't say enough about this speaker. Get it. Immediately and start dancing!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: An amazing sound experience for the audiophile with lots of cash
customer_reviews.text: An amazing sound experience for the audiophile with lots of cash. Works especially well for classical and piano music. Easy to use, extemely mobile and incredible battery life between charges. Highly recommend this product over the orginal Soundlink; noticeable gains in bass response and overall sound quality at all volumes. Easier to move around from room to room without that somewhat annoying flap on the bottom as on the original and II.
customer_reviews.author: TPH1983

customer_reviews.title: I'd love it more if it didn't cost $250
customer_reviews.text: I'd love it more if it didn't cost $250, but now I have real bluetooth speaker that produces amazing sound for the size and whose battery lasts for like 10 hours... great compatibility w/ my phone's bluetooth and never have any sync problems with it. Very portable. Heavy little sucker. Go Giants!! (gosh they blew this year... bye JPP, you blew it! Literally)
customer_reviews.author: Rover

customer_reviews.title: What I expected from Bose.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, easy to connect and use, and the battery lasts forever. It sounds best when you're straight ahead of the speaker, but I think that's probably to be expected from something this size. Bass is excessive at times but the unit just needs to be adjusted relative to a wall or turn the unit, etc to get the sound you want. I really like this product and recommend it for convenient portable sound and a high quality solution.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lewis

customer_reviews.title: These Bluetooth speakers do a fine job of allowing you to listen to MP3 music ...
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth speakers do a fine job of allowing you to listen to MP3 music files or streaming music from your computer as you move about in your house. The speakers are a bit pricey, like other Bose speakers, but, since they. deliver excellent sound, they may be the speakers of choice for most music lovers.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Keown

customer_reviews.title: Id buy it again. You what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Made with quality. It's good, sounds good, nice and clear, has a little bump. It a Bose product for sure. For the price I was expecting a little bit more but it's defently enough to put by the pool are take to the beach. I don't think it was a bad decision. You get what you pay for. I know what I would have got if I'd ordered one of those $40 specials .
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but consider the excellent Soundlink Mini instead
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my parents and they love it. I actually prefer the highs and overall soundstage of the Soundlink Mini, which I use myself, but everyone's ears are different and it certainly sounds better than your standard cheap speaker system.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Hubel

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound, compact and powerful. I even used it with a microphone app in my iphone on a rally and it worked really good.
customer_reviews.author: iam

customer_reviews.title: not good condition
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that the back of this Bose speaker looks like its been dragged across the LaBrea Tar Pits which is a area is Southern California where it oozes oil and tar .. I was truly upset with the wear and tear of the backside of this speaker also isn't their a battery console that the speaker sits on that came with the product ...Mello but not today..
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert W.

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Speaker. Sound quality is awesome. The only downside of this speaker is the price. But if you can afford it, you will not be sorry. For a case, instead of the Bose case check out the Deluxe Travel case from Surf to Summit (on Amazon). The combination of Bose speaker and travel case will give you a rugged go anywhere speaker that sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Nice little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice. I expected a lot from this speaker and it did not disappoint. Only have one con. Battery lasts long, but not as long as I hoped. And once the battery is low, the performance of the speaker goes down dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: carl8green

customer_reviews.title: I'm 58 And everything Sounds So Much Better!
customer_reviews.text: Bose Lives Up To It's Reputation. I'm 58 And everything Sounds So Much Better!
customer_reviews.author: andrew p.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound. Speaker tech has come a long way ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Well made. Amazing sound. Speaker tech has come a long way and the dept of the sound might make you think you're listening to a large speaker. So easy to play Pandora, itunes, or any internet material through. Tonight I actually played a bunch of upbeat music on it while on my elliptical machine. Wow, did that improve my workout. It's a real quality product and I also enjoy the mini. -G
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: after a year I wish I didn't own this. ...
customer_reviews.text: after a year I wish I didn't own this. I constantly have trouble connecting to my PC. It wastes my time to attempt reconnecting. I'm usually a fan of Bose products but this I sincerely regret. With a corded speaker my issues would be null.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for the Money.  A little pricey, but lasts all day.
customer_reviews.text: Great Speaker. We love it. We purchased this for hanging out on our deck. Easily connects to any bluetooth device. We use our phones, and iPod to listen to music. Depending on the volume, we've gotten 12hours of use out of it, but on average it lasts over 7 hours before needing to be recharged and the sound is great! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Chief Navy Pride

customer_reviews.title: A compact speaker that is easy to use and provides execellent sound.
customer_reviews.text: The Bose Sound Link III is is a great little speaker albeit expensive at $300. However, for our needs, one really does not need a stereo system in their family room which is where I have this speaker. The sound is rich and I rarely need to play it at the upper range of its capabilities. We plan to take it with us when we travel, though I anticipate that the sound level may be overkill for what we will need for most destinations. Assuming this speaker lasts 8-10 years, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bose does it again! I heard one of these while visiting friends and was impressed. There are a lot of blue tooth speakers to choose from. They may be good too, but all I know is this speaker sounds amazing and is very easy to use. The battery life is really good. I've never had a problem with it running down while I'm using the speaker. It remembers what device it was last coupled with and just works. I have several things paired with it and it handles them seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Yomanne

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent Bose product
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent Bose product. Great sound. Connects easily to Bluetooth.. just wish it had a carry strap or handle for mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Meske

customer_reviews.title: C'mon ... it's a Bose ... what do you expect?
customer_reviews.text: Freakin' love this thing. I had the Bose Soundlink Mini (which is about $100 less) and it was execellent. But the longer battery life is a big bonus, and the sound is somewhat more "roomy" than the mini. Go with either one, really.
customer_reviews.author: PTREE

customer_reviews.title: ... my Soundlink III a few months back and absolutely love it. Fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought my Soundlink III a few months back and absolutely love it. Fantastic sound quality, hard to believe that something so small can produce such a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Parr

customer_reviews.title: Connected great, easy function
customer_reviews.text: Connected great, easy function. Sounds superb, as most Bose radios do. I gave 4 instead of 5 stars because although it sounds really good with most genres of music, some hip hop and other bass related music doesn't sound as good. But if you don't listen to that, then 5 stars! I use it for my kitchen radio and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Look sleek and the sound is amazing. Only think I don't like is the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Look sleek and the sound is amazing. Only think I don't like is the battery seem to die rather quickly. I can have it fully charge and about 3 hrs later the battery is flashing to be charge. Maybe I missed that part that the battery only last 3 hrs. Beside battery issue I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thao Ma

customer_reviews.title: The new model has no such cover/base so it easily tips over unless it is carefully positioned on a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this series III to replace an earlier model that was stolen from me. The performance is about the same but the construction of the new model is much inferior. The predecessor had a folding cover that, when opened, provided a stable base so that the speaker could stand upright securely. The new model has no such cover/base so it easily tips over unless it is carefully positioned on a solid flat surface. I was very disappointed in this negative change in design.
customer_reviews.author: john r b

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Bose has really hit a Home Run with this product. I also have the previous models sound link 1&2. How they have made a speaker this small play so loud and undistorted is amazing. This unit plays Bluetooth only as with the previous models and just sounds fantastic. How they get Bluetooth to sound as good as this unit puts out is really something.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Allshouse

customer_reviews.title: This is for the true sound enthusiast.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase of the year for me. The sound quality is amazing and the ability to link multiple devices with the push of a button is awesome. (Note: only one device can play at a time, but it remembers multiple devices for easy connection.) Comes ready to connect via Bluetooth and rock on.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Henry

customer_reviews.title: Bose however made this one great. In my apartment or on the beach it ...
customer_reviews.text: First test was a full charge and 10 hour drive, still had plenty of juice left. Not a musician nor an audiophile but I can't stand the hissing or static I hear from some of the other bluetooth speakers I had before. Bose however made this one great. In my apartment or on the beach it delivers a great sound. I normally use it just for music but have also hooked it up to the computer and watched movies with a great sound. Amazon had it for almost 100$ less than I can buy it overseas so that was just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Grampa Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and I like the size compared to my old ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried this live in a store prior to purchase. Sounds great and I like the size compared to my old Sound Dock. Some people have complained that it doesn't have a remote. I find that when using my old Sound Dock I kept the remote with it. If I didn't, I lost/forgot where I put it. So, using the buttons on the Soundlink means I have one less piece to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Nursecooksomm

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal On Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The speaker pairs easily and sounds awesome! I believe this to be the best deal out there. You get the best $300 speaker out for $250. All you have to do is pick one of the 6 NFL teams. I'm a Steeler fan but settled for the Seahawks....couldn't be happier. I first had the $180 UE Boom. The Boom is nowhere close. This Bose can really fill the place with sound. We love it! Highly recommended, especially for $250!!!
customer_reviews.author: zodia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little clunky to get it to connect to my macbook
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The sound on it never disappoints, even after a year of usage. Base is great while you can still tell apart countless instruments. Will purchase IF mine ever breaks, which I believe will only happen of my own accord.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Movie marathons on my iPad have never been this good!
customer_reviews.text: I got this along with the Soundlink Color and I can say I love both. The SLIII is a powerful speaker and I have actually been using it to watch movies on my iPad. The sound is great! It fills up any room with sound easily. It's also great outdoors. It's not as portable as the Soundlink Color, but I leave this at home most of the time anyway. Overall, great sound quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Chi Samaniego

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Speaker III
product_meta.description:
Style:Bose Speaker| Product Packaging:Standard Packaging


BOSE SOUNDLINK BLUETOOTH SPEAKER III

SHARE THE MUSIC. SHOW YOUR STYLE.
Meet the speaker that brings your music and friends together—with a style that’s all your own. The SoundLink Bluetooth speaker III is our best-performing mobile Bluetooth speaker. It plays louder and longer than its popular predecessor, with advanced Bose technologies that reproduce the fullness, clarity and depth of your music. And a colorful assortment of optional covers let you personalize your speaker.

 * Connects wirelessly to your smartphone, tablet or other Bluetooth device
 * Sound performance unlike any other mobile speaker this size
 * Curved edges and thin profile for easy grab-and-go portability
 * Silicone button panel protects from dirt and dust; wraparound metal grille adds to durability and resists fingerprints
 * Rechargeable battery plays up to 14 hours


Start the party anywhere—with better sound.
POWERFUL PERFORMANCE
It’s no secret: your music is the foundation for a good time. And this speaker delivers. Four drivers and two passive radiators provide full-spectrum audio and clarity at any listening level. Plus, you’ll hear incomparable bass performance not found in other mobile speakers. And improvements in digital signal processing let you share your music louder than the previous version of our Bluetooth speaker.


PAIR AND PLAY
This compact speaker pairs easily with your smartphone, iPad or other Bluetooth device. It has a range of about 30 feet, so you can enjoy the sound you want without wires. Simply press and hold the Bluetooth button on the speaker's top panel, and then choose the SoundLink speaker III from your device. The speaker remembers the most recent six devices you've used, so reconnecting is even simpler.

Optional covers add flair—and further protection—for your SoundLink speaker III. FORM AND FUNCTION
Sure, the sound draws a crowd. But this speaker also has a sleek look you’ll appreciate. Curved edges and a thin profile make a bold statement, especially when you add a touch of color with an optional cover. The speaker easily slips right into a bag or backpack. The silicone button panel protects it from dirt and dust, while a wraparound metal grille adds to its durability and resists fingerprints.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
 * Aux input enables audio connections from other sources, increasing versatility of system
 * USB port allows for software update to ensure ongoing Bluetooth device compatibility
 * Compact power adapter folds flat to fit easily in a bag, ideal for extended trips
 * Optional 12V car charger for charging your speaker while on the road

PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Dimensions: 5.18"H x 10.08"W x 1.89"D
 * Weight: 3.03 pounds
 * Wall charger: Cord length: 54"

WHAT’S IN THE BOX
 * SoundLink Bluetooth speaker III
 * Wall charger
feature_bullets: Connects wirelessly to your smartphone, tablet or other Bluetooth device
Sound performance unlike any other mobile speaker this size
Curved edges and thin profile for easy grab-and-go portability
Silicone button panel protects from dirt and dust; Rechargeable battery plays up to 14 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,502 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
